alert.note: Alert for North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Walton County through 445 PM CDT... At 413 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Florala. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Union, Liberty, Paxton, Gordon, Cluster Springs, Fox Hill, Gaskin, Sand Hill, Darlington, Glendale, Lakewood, Pleasant Hill, Center Ridge, Flowersville, New Harmony, Piney Grove and Caney Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
